template.name: gc-pytorch-logistic-regression
template.value:
import torch.nn as nn
loss_function = $LOSS_FUNCTION$
# SGD: Stochastic Gradient Descent optimizer = $OPITIMIZER$
epochs = $EPOCHS$ losses = []
for i in range(epochs): y_pred = model.forward(x_data) loss = loss_function(y_pred, y_data) print("epoch: ", i, "loss", loss.item())
losses.append(loss.item()) optimizer.zero_grad() loss.backward() optimizer.step()
